title: Himi 276
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ko e Laumālie,
‘O hotau ‘Otua,
Ko e monū’ia’anga,
Ki he angahala.
2.
’Oku ‘a’ahi mai,
’A ‘ene ‘Afio;
Ki he kakai angakovi,
Pea takitala’i.
3.
Pea fakaongo,
Ki he lotonoa;
Pea fakapoto leva,
‘A e loto vale.
4.
’Oku ne langa’i
‘I he loto kovi,
‘A e feinga mamahi,
Mo e manavahē.
5.
Pea ‘oku taki,
‘E he Laumālie,
‘A e kakai ‘oku holi;
Ki he vai mo’ui.
6.
’A ia ko Sīsū,
‘Oku anga’ofa,
Ki he kau feinga mamahi,
Mo e mafasia. *
